code.name: saturate
code.comment: Clamp to [0,1] - this operation is free under certain circumstances. For further information see http://www.humus.name/Articles/Persson_LowLevelThinking.pdf and http://www.humus.name/Articles/Persson_LowlevelShaderOptimization.pdf

helpers.code: void rot45(inout vec2 p) { p = (p + vec2(p.y, -p.x))*sqrt(0.5); }
float rep1(float p, float c) { return mod(p,c)-0.5*c; }
vec2 rep2(vec2 p, vec2 c) { return mod(p,c)-0.5*c; }
vec3 rep3(vec3 p, vec3 c) { return mod(p,c)-0.5*c; }
float lengthSqr(vec3 x) { return dot(x, x); }
float vmax(vec2 v) { return max(v.x, v.y); }
float vmax(vec3 v) { return max(max(v.x, v.y), v.z); }
float vmax(vec4 v) { return max(max(v.x, v.y), max(v.z, v.w)); }
float vmin(vec2 v) { return min(v.x, v.y); }
float vmin(vec3 v) { return min(min(v.x, v.y), v.z); }
float vmin(vec4 v) { return min(min(v.x, v.y), min(v.z, v.w)); }

node.name: fSphere
node.caption: Sphere
node.function: float fSphere(vec3 p, float r) { return length(p) - r; }

node.name: fPlane
node.caption: Plane
node.comment: Plane with normal n (n is normalized) at some distance from the origin
node.function: float fPlane(vec3 p, vec3 n, float distanceFromOrigin) { return dot(p, n) + distanceFromOrigin; }

node.name: fBoxCheap
node.caption: Box (cheap)
node.function: float fBoxCheap(vec3 p, vec3 b) { return vmax(abs(p) - b); }

node.name: fOctahedron
node.caption: Octahedron (GDF)
node.function: float fOctahedron(vec3 p, float r) { return fGDF(p, r, 3, 6); }

node.caption: Union Stairs

node.name: fOpIntersectionStairs
node.caption: Intersection Stairs
node.function: float fOpIntersectionStairs(float a, float b, float r, float n) { return -fOpUnionStairs(-a, -b, r, n); }

node.name: fOpDifferenceStairs
node.caption: Difference Stairs
node.function: float fOpDifferenceStairs(float a, float b, float r, float n) { return -fOpUnionStairs(-a, b, r, n); }

node.name: fOpUnionSoft
node.caption: Union Soft
node.function: float fOpUnionSoft(float a, float b, float r) { float e = max(r - abs(a - b), 0); return min(a, b) - e*e*0.25/r; }

node.name: fOpPipe
node.caption: Pipe
node.function: float fOpPipe(float a, float b, float r) { return length(vec2(a, b)) - r; }

node.name: fOpEngrave
node.caption: Engrave
node.function: float fOpEngrave(float a, float b, float r) { return max(a, (a + r - abs(b))*sqrt(0.5)); }

node.name: fOpGroove
node.caption: Groove
node.function: float fOpGroove(float a, float b, float ra, float rb) { return max(a, min(a + ra, rb - abs(b))); }

node.name: fOpTongue
node.caption: Tongue
node.function: float fOpTongue(float a, float b, float ra, float rb) { return min(a, max(a - ra, abs(b) - rb)); }
